articles.title: Global vaccination must be swifter - Nature.com
articles.description: Speeding up development of new vaccines won’t help much in the next pandemic, unless world leaders work faster to roll out vaccination globally.
articles.content: Last September, more than 100 governments attending US President Joe Bidens virtual Global COVID-19 Summit committed to vaccinating at least 70% of the population in every country by September 2022. … [+19804 chars]

articles.author: TN Digital
articles.title: Sexually transmitted infections: Hidden symptoms that should never be ignored - Times Now
articles.description: Experts have revealed some hidden symptoms of an STI that warrant urgent attention, and these do not appear on or around the genitals.
articles.content: Sexually transmitted infections (STI) have unfortunately become a common occurrence these days with symptoms like sores, blisters and burning sensations near the genitals.
